3783782.title: [Bug Fix] Resolve MDS Namespace Misconfiguration
3783782.description:
This PR addresses an issue with the MDS namespace configuration in app-resources.json.

### Key Fixes:
- Corrected misconfigured namespace mappings in MDS.
- Updated resource allocation settings for consistency.
- Improved validation checks to prevent future misconfigurations.

### Expected Impact:
- Ensures proper namespace resolution for MDS services.
- Reduces deployment issues caused by incorrect configurations.
- Improves system stability and maintainability.

### Testing:
- Verified namespace resolution in staging environments.
- Ran automated configuration validation tests.
- Conducted a manual review of app-resources.json updates.
